body:
- A program that generates ASCII pictures of a cow with a message.
- Spack is missing this important package.
- This is used by @ArangoGutierrez the ISC19 Singularity tutorial, so we clearly need it in Spack.

```
$ cowsay spack needs more moo
 ______________________ 
< spack needs more moo >
 ---------------------- 
        \   ^__^
         \  (oo)\_______
            (__)\       )\/\
                ||----w |
                ||     ||
```
title: cowsay: new package
